# vis4cast

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/eco4cast/vis4cast/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/eco4cast/vis4cast/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

Currently `vis4cast` is mostly a home for plotting code and helper utilities that may be used / reused across neon4cast dashboards.
It may mature over time into a more general purpose forecasting dashboard system.


## Installation

You can install the development version of vis4cast from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("eco4cast/vis4cast")
```
